i collected football cards.
world cup, back when i cared about sports.
i listened to system of a down and linkin park.

and that is all actually.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ecf3c26368724138180000#post_53ecf3c26368724138180000

when i look back at the music i used to listen, i feel that i was pretty much destined to like loud rap.

system of a down its known for being really abbrasive, and kind of rap in their music, same with rage against the machine, they dont rap but they have a fast way of singing.

and linkin park is full nu metal.


and back i used to actually play sports WITH PEOPLE.

weird right?
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ecf4876368724451770000#post_53ecf4876368724451770000
Ha! You think that's weird? Back then I used to be SOCIAL!

(I'm so lonely)

I find that I love all genres of Music really, each of them has something I like to listen to.

Though I love me some 70-80's funky get down music. It's hard trying to find a song as Funktastic now a days so when I do find one I tend to automatically get my groove back.
